title: The Humble address of the officers in your excellencies army in the name of themselves and their brethren as it was presented to his excellency this 2d day of May, 1660 / by us whose names are subscribed.
publisher: Printed by William Godbid for John Playford,
notes: At head of title: To his excellency the Lord General Monck, Capt. General of all the armies and forces in England, Scotland, and Ireland, and one of the generals at sea.
Signed with the names of ninety-two officers.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
